name: Scifi cyberpunk free music pack loop 2
name_original: Scifi cyberpunk free music pack loop 2
description:
Music asset Pack 2 for your games. 10 Ambiants, battles and events tracks (loops) for scifi / cyberpunk moods.

- Ogg vorbis files

it will be fair to leave a comment if you have downlaoded the file.

You can use it freely in your game ( don't forget to ad me in credits).

Feel free to contact me :

- for any request ;
- if you are selling your game using my music ;
- if you have a solid project and whant to work with me.

Also take look at the pack 1 : https://kayugames.itch.io/scifi-cyberpunk-music-pack-loops

licence CC BY

I've produced some Original SoundTracks for indie studios, so take a look at :

https://kayupla.bandcamp.com/

other creations : https://soundcloud.com/kayu-pla
